welcome_message_body: Welcome to South Gate, where the rich history and vibrant culture await you. Explore our charming city, known for its local music scene and delicious food, and make the most of your time here. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Compton Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Compton Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport is primarily used for general aviation and private aircraft.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Long Beach Municipal Airport is used for cargo and charter flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Tom Bradley International Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for various airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Delta Air Lines.

terminals.name: Terminal 6
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Alaska Airlines, Air Canada, and others.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for United Airlines.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login or have time limits.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and has a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private and charter flights, offering a more exclusive and luxurious experience.

wifi.note: WiFi is free for all passengers and can be accessed throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Bob Hope Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Bob Hope Airport serves smaller regional airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
